Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization granted to the county of Essex to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends the authorization granted to the county of Essex to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes until November 30th, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization granted to the county of Essex to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
